content.mainShortText: I'm a software developer whose interest in computer science and programming started at age 14. Since then, I've been developing different kinds of software, working with several languages, frameworks and tools. Despite working with Frontend, Backend and DevOps, I like the Backend the most. Currently, I'm going deep into Rust in my free time.
